pages.text: Yeast is used by the $(l:cellar/ferment_barrel)Fermentation Barrel$() to ferment fluids.  Each type of fermented fluid requires a different yeast.$(br2)Yeast can be multiplied with the $(l:cellar/culture_jar)Culture Jar$().

$(bold)Bayanus Yeast$() - This yeast is used to ferment wine.$(br2)$(bold)Source$() - You can find Bayanus Yeast by harvesting grass.$(br2)$(bold)Culturing$() - Needs either Red, Purple or White grape juice.
$(bold)Brewer's Yeast$() - Brewer's yeast is used to ferment ales.$(br2)$(bold)Source$() - You can find Brewer's Yeast by harvesting grass.$(br2)$(bold)Culturing$() - Needs generic Wort from wheat.

$(bold)Lager Yeast$() - Lager yeast is used to ferment lagers.$(br2)$(bold)Source$() - You can find Lager Yeast by harvesting snow in snowy biomes.$(br2)$(bold)Culturing$() - Needs generic Wort from wheat.

$(bold)Ethereal Yeast$() - These are magical versions of yeast, which do not have a purpose yet.$(br2)$(bold)Source$() - Ethereal yeast is not currently lootable in the world.$(br2)$(bold)Culturing$() - Needs generic Wort from wheat.
